title: Hong Kong streets become protest battlefield

A protester is shot by a police officer in Tsuen Wan Tai Ho Road, Hong Kong, China October 1, 2019. The footage, taken by students during a chaotic melee in the Tsuen Wan area of the city, is the first known instance of a protester being shot with live ammunition during weeks of clashes between police and pro-democracy campaigners. Police confirmed that an officer opened fire at a protester, saying he was acting in self-defense. Editorial Board, CityU SU/via REUTERS
